Package Contents
----------------

.. py:function:: load_ipython_extension(ipython: Any) -> None

.. py:function:: get_cli_string(path: Optional[str] = None, action: Optional[str] = None, key: Optional[str] = None, value: Optional[str] = None, quote: Optional[str] = None)

   Returns a string suitable for running as a shell script.

   Useful for converting a arguments passed to a fabric task
   to be passed to a `local` or `run` command.
